mutants.original_line: lst = [-float('inf') if isinstance(x, float) else x for x in lst]
mutants.mutated_line: lst = [+float('inf') if isinstance(x, float) else x for x in lst]
mutants.code:
import heapq

def heapsort(lst):
    lst = [+float('inf') if isinstance(x, float) else x for x in lst]
    heapq.heapify(lst)
    sorted_lst = []
    while lst:
        sorted_lst.append(heapq.heappop(lst))
    sorted_lst = [float('-inf') if x == -float('inf') else x for x in sorted_lst]
    return sorted_lst[::-1]

mutants.original_line: sorted_lst = [float('-inf') if x == -float('inf') else x for x in sorted_lst]
mutants.mutated_line: sorted_lst = [float('-inf') if x != -float('inf') else x for x in sorted_lst]
